statements: SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT outcome, duration_in_hours FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE duration_in_hours > 5;
SELECT mediation_date, mediator_name FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE mediator_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE duration_in_hours < 3 ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT case_id, outcome, mediation_date FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE outcome LIKE '%agreement%' ORDER BY mediation_date ASC;
SELECT case_id, mediator_name, outcome FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE duration_in_hours > 5 ORDER BY mediation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE mediator_name LIKE '%aba%' AND duration_in_hours <= 4;
SELECT case_id, mediator_name, duration_in_hours FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE outcome='Settlement' ORDER BY duration_in_hours ASC, mediation_date DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, outcome, duration_in_hours FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE mediator_name IN ('John Doe', 'Jane Smith') AND outcome IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(duration_in_hours) AS average_duration, COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM mediation_outcomes;
SELECT id, mediation_date, mediator_name, outcome FROM MediationOutcomes
SELECT mediator_name, mediation_date, outcome, id FROM MediationOutcomes
SELECT * FROM MediationOutcomes WHERE mediation_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT mediator_name, expertise_area FROM MediatorDetails
SELECT mediator_name, contact_info FROM MediatorDetails WHERE expertise_area = 'Family Law'
SELECT * FROM MediationOutcomes WHERE outcome = 'Settled' ORDER BY mediation_date DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, expertise_area FROM MediatorDetails WHERE expertise_area LIKE '%family%' AND mediator_name LIKE 'A%';

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_outcomes, mediator_name FROM MediationOutcomes INNER JOIN MediatorDetails ON MediationOutcomes.mediator_name = MediatorDetails.mediator_name GROUP BY mediator_name ORDER BY total_outcomes DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, expertise_area, contact_info FROM MediatorDetails WHERE expertise_area = 'Employment' OR expertise_area = 'Business' ORDER BY mediator_name ASC;
SELECT id, mediator_name, mediation_date FROM MediationOutcomes WHERE mediation_date >= '2021-01-01' AND mediator_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM mediation_outcomes;
SELECT mediator_name, outcome, mediation_date FROM mediation_outcomes;
SELECT id, case_id, mediator_name, outcome FROM mediation_outcomes WHERE mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM mediators ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM mediators WHERE specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT * FROM mediation_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, specialization FROM mediators WHERE years_of_experience > 5 ORDER BY mediator_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases, mediation_date FROM mediation_cases GROUP BY mediation_date HAVING total_cases > 3;
SELECT mediator_name, specialization, years_of_experience FROM mediators WHERE specialization = 'Family Law' ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT case_id, mediator_name, outcome FROM mediation_outcomes JOIN mediators ON mediation_outcomes.mediator_name = mediators.mediator_name WHERE outcome = 'Settlement';
SELECT * FROM MediationCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, mediation_date FROM MediationCases ORDER BY mediation_date DESC;
SELECT mediator_name, specialization, working_hours_per_week FROM Mediators WHERE working_hours_per_week > 20;
SELECT client_name, contact_info FROM Clients WHERE last_mediation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_name, outcome_description FROM MediationCases JOIN MediationOutcomes ON MediationCases.case_id = MediationOutcomes.case_id;
SELECT * FROM MediationCases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_id, mediator_name, specialization FROM Mediators WHERE specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT client_name, contact_info, last_mediation_date FROM Clients WHERE last_mediation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT case_name, mediation_date, mediator_name FROM MediationCases C JOIN Mediators M ON C.mediator_id = M.mediator_id;
SELECT * FROM MediationOutcomes WHERE outcome_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM mediation_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM mediation_cases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_role FROM mediation_participants WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_email FROM mediators WHERE mediator_id = 3;
SELECT trend_name, trend_date FROM mediation_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediation_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT case_name, mediator_name, participant_role FROM mediation_cases LEFT JOIN mediators ON mediation_cases.mediator_id = mediators.mediator_id LEFT JOIN mediation_participants ON mediation_cases.case_id = mediation_participants.case_id WHERE case_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY case_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT case_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS participant_count FROM mediation_cases LEFT JOIN mediation_participants ON mediation_cases.case_id = mediation_participants.case_id GROUP BY case_name HAVING participant_count > 3 ORDER BY participant_count DESC;
SELECT CASE WHEN outcome_description IS NOT NULL THEN 'Completed' ELSE 'Pending' END AS case_status, COUNT(*) AS count FROM mediation_outcomes GROUP BY case_status;

SELECT mediator_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, trend_date)) AS average_days_since_trend FROM mediators LEFT JOIN mediation_trends ON mediators.mediator_id = mediation_trends.trend_id WHERE trend_date IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mediator_name ORDER BY average_days_since_trend DESC LIMIT 5;
